item.title: Antares
item.description:
An important part of the overall proposal, initiated by the previous posts, is the program that can be used to carry it out. Actually, along with the previous one, I developed some time ago an Integrated Tax Administration System (ITAS), called Antares, about which there is a demo in the following link https://antares.socrates.theworkpc.com, which and was originally filed with a development bank.

I hope you like it and find it useful as an interesting starting point, anything you can contact me at leobelen@gmail.com.
